amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Education to conduct outreach activities to educate students and their families about the transition to Federal Direct Lending.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-256 to require the Secretary of Education to conduct outreach activities to educate students and their families about the transition to Federal Direct Lending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Cuellar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
